评论详情: My daughter needed a warm sweater for her trip and it got here in time, in fact two days earlier then expected. Warm and soft perfect to keep her warm for her trip!
Colors are beautiful, very comfortable and true to size. I will definitely buy other colors as well.

Love these sweatshirts. I have several colors and they have all held up well in the wash, no pilling. I am 5'2" 115lbs and have both small and medium. The medium gives me a little of an oversized fit. Fit my sleeves just fine. Size up one for leggings coverage. A thicker sweatshirt for sure. Love it
The wrist cuffs and neck cuff faded after 2 wash but love the color and fit

评论概述: Horrible sizing from the same brand
评论详情: I am soooo mad. I have a hoodie from this brand and I absolutely love the fit of it. I wanted their sweatshirt in a crew neck version because sometimes the hood can get in a way. I ordered the crew neck in the same size since it’s also labeled “oversized” and the difference is huge. Both sweatshirts are in size medium but the crew neck is short, tight on the bottom, keeps riding up. Horrible. I wish I kept the bag so I could return. What a waste of $35.
Love the weight and feel of this sweatshirt. It’s nice and roomy, appears well-made, and is soft.

This sweatshirt is really comfortable, but fits strange. Hard to explain the way the fit feels. It’s comfortable and warm and washes well. Material seems like it is decent quality. Not sure about getting another one though.

This sweatshirt is so soft and comfortable. It's also so stylish even my preteen daughter wanted one. The fit is a little oversized but still true to size. I ordered a medium and a small for my daughter. It has not shrunk but I also dry on low heat. It washes well and has not faded. Excellent value for the money. I have bought 3 of these now I love them so much.
The fit it and cut is as advertised. However, this color is more yellow and cheap looking for this option. Thickness not as expected either for the price.

评论概述: I want one in every color!
评论详情: I purchased this on a day it was significantly marked down, as I normally do, and I am so glad I did! It is great for a cute, oversized fit. It is very warm, and the muted neural is super flattering on my olive skin tone. It is good quality and has lasted through several washes already. Great material, and doesn’t pill either. I did size up to an XL, but it hasn’t shrunk even though it feels like cotton.
This sweatshirt is so comfortable fits to size really I would go a size bigger then you are!! But overall it’s a very comfy and nice sweatshirt!!
The material is thicker, almost a bit stiff in my opinion.  I like it for an oversized look with jeans. Ture to size.

评论概述: It cute but to big and I even got a size small so yea I didn’t like it

评论详情: It’s nice and thick and definitely oversized. I ordered a medium and it feels like a large. A small would have been ideal!

I absolutely adore this sweat shirt. It's short so I can wear it with my baggy pants. If you want a longer shirt maybe size up. If you do, know it'll be very oversized. It's very warm & I'm really cold natured. I have an army green one in my cart to order. It's not pilled after washing and stains come off easily with a tide pen. I don't put in dryer because I don't want to risk shrinking it. I'm 5ft4 135 lbs & a small fit great.
Love it. Soft fleece material, baggy. I got a medium and it’s just the right amount of baggy

Quality is better than aritzia at the fraction of the price! Oversized look. I ordered a size small and it fit very comfy and slouchy! I am 5’4 and 115 pounds for reference. If you are going for a more fitted look size down!
Fits as described.  Loose and long to wear with leggings.
I purchased 2 of these in different colors and I was so impressed with the quality of this sweat shirt. I will be ordering more soon. The feeling is so comfy
This was a great buy for the money! Very thick and comfortable. I got a medium. Fits perfectly. Washed and not much shrinkage at all. I’m 125lbs 5’5 and it’s just like I like it!

If you love oversized sweatshirts then you will love it. It’s not huge but it’s just oversized enough. I always get a medium so that’s what I got and it bigger than my usual size mediums but I love it. It’s also very warm. It’s not too thick but it’s cozy. I would definitely recommend.
I love this sweater, very nice quality
I absolutely love this sweatshirt! The fit is oversized which I love, but I wish it was slightly longer (it hits just below my belly button). I will definitely be keeping it though!

This has quickly become my favorite sweatshirt. It is so comfortable and fits so well! Goes with just about anything (I got light grey but have two more to buy in my cart!). Washes really well. Perfect weight for indoors and warm outside with a coat. I’m 5’6”, 160#, 36C and got a medium.

Ordered a size larger than my normal and was expecting it to be extra oversized and it fits more like my normal size. The sleeve are also very baggy but short. Very soft on the inside but overall really uncomfortable due to the shape of it
Very comfortable

评论用户: I ordered this gift for my boyfriend and he loves it. It is so bright and great quality.
评论详情: So cozy!! Fits a little small; definitely recommend sizing up but I ordered 2 different colors and love them
Love this sweat shirt! I want one in every color!
I ordered a large. It didn’t fit well for me, it was the perfect length but it was puffy in the shoulders. The material felt cheap and like it wouldn’t last too long. I’m returning it
I love baggy sweatshirts to lounge in. This is perfect and so comfy.

My wife loves this sweatshirt, it is incredibly soft. I couldn’t believe it myself until I felt it. She loves it and looks good in it too. It is of good quality, it has upheld its form from a decent number of washings.
It fits great
Love this sweatshirt. So comfy. You can dress it up with fashionable booties, or dress it down with big socks or cozy uggs.

The material is soft and will keep you warm. I ordered my usual size as other clothes but this is just too big. For reference my frame is rectangular/leaning towards apple. Wasn’t very flattering then.
These sweatshirts are great and affordable. Sized great, not too baggy, warm, soft and great color options.
Perfect thick over sized sweater ! Do not size up . Purchased my regular size small and it was the perfect oversized fit

While it’s so soft inside and out, and the color is great, it’s just a really awkward fit. I’m usually a 10/12, or a large. I ordered an xl for an oversized fit. The neck is so wide, and the whole thing just fits like a stiff square box. And the arms are short and don’t even come to my wrists. I’ve tried tucking, rolling, etc. It just is a terrible fit.
Great color and fabric but it's stupid big. Even if I sized down I feel like it would be too big and sleeves too small. Made so weird
Size Large. Fits true to size and super comfortable.
Don’t hesitate. Thick, soft and warm. Fits cute!! Beautiful sweatshirts!!
Loved the material and its baggy fit. I am usually between a S and M, I chose to go with M.
This is probably going to be one of my favorite sweatshirts. I probably could have gone a size down but I still like the fit. It’s very warm and cozy, almost squishy.
This was such a cozy sweatshirt the material is soo nice and the fit is perfect

This is the perfect oversize sweater! It is true to size, the material was so comfortable. It is a perfect lounge around the house sweater. You can dress it up or dress it down, the material is not thick at all, the price was great for the amazing quality of this.
Soft. Oversized alittle not alot. Sleeves don't go past wrist. Wore with jean jackets and tights. I do like causal sunday Sunday fit.
This sweatshirt is thick and well made, available in several colors, so far I’ve bought 2 but will be buying more!
Comfortable. Nice material. Roomy.
I am in love with this pull over I was very shocked because I am picky with my hoodies cause I am short gal 5’1

So this sweatshirt is thick and very cozy and soft. Is definitely a bit bulky and oversized but hits waist in a good place. 1st thing is I got the tan color and thought it would be a darker tan, more of a ivory/khaki. Most importantly, wash separately the first couple times, the fuzz inside gets over allllll of the clothes!

I normally wear Large or XL.  I got an XL....it's HUGE!  but it's short and the sleeves feel weird.  Material is super soft tho.  I wish I would've tried the Large but I couldn't return, hubby threw the bag away.  Stuck with it. :(

评论概述: Comfy but not soft or stretchy
评论详情: I was looking for something soft and stretchy. This sweatshirt is nice but not stretchy, and the sleeves and overall length were a bit short. It fits a little awkwardly for me.

The first thing I noticed when I opened this package was how thick this sweatshirt is. The fabric is heavier than any other crew neck I’ve worn, which means it’s warmer than any other crew neck I’ve ever worn too. Also, the fleece on the inside is super soft! I got the armygreen and it is true to the pictures. For the fit, I ordered a smaller size based on the listed measurements because I didn’t want an oversized fit. I normally wear an xl for fitted tops and xxl for sweatshirts to have a little breathing room; I’m 5’9” with slightly broad shoulders. I bought a size large (sized down 2 sizes) and it’s perfect for a relaxed fit. I will be buying more colors, this is my new favorite sweatshirt, especially for the fall and winter months!
Warm and cozy. It was much thicker than I thought it would be.  I love it
Great quality, soft and stylish!
My daughter is hard to shop for. She liked these quite a bit. Oversized is what they want.
This top is so comfortable and cute. It is perfect with jeans or leggings. The color is exactly as pictured. The fabric is warm and soft as well!
Save your money and buy a sweatshirt from Walmart for 1/3 of the price. Fits weird. Not soft. Short arms. It’s a no.

评论概述: What you look for in an oversized sweatshirt
评论详情: Absolutely love this so much that I can back and brought 2 more. The color is amazing and doesn’t fade. Ive worn this every week and it stays fluffy even after all of the washes.
This sweatshirt is comfy, which is what I was looking for.  It’s baggy, which I love, giving it great style.  love this color and it comes in many other great colors.  Planning to buy more!!
Such a soft material sweater! Great price.  Not heavy on you but cozy enough to hug you! Can’t wait for the winter!!! Must buy it!
Nice sweatshirt but the color doesn’t match the online picture. Read the color.
Just like the picture super nice soft and comfortable

This sweatshirt is thick, cute, bright and comfortable. The material is good and soft, and it fits TTS. I just need the sleeves to be just a tad bit longer for my preference. I feel like if I washed it, it would shrink. But the color is nice and bold. I’m upset because this was perfect for the shoes I bought it for. But overall, pretty decent sweatshirt. It will definitely keep you warm on those late fall days.
I really wish they would stop forcing men's clothing on women. I downsized and it still came down to my thighs! Very soft and warm but returning because of fit.

评论概述: Cute but sleeves a tad short
评论详情: 5’3” and I got a small.. The sweatshirt length falls at a flattering spot, but the shoulder seams are quite wide… which makes the sleeves pretty short whenever I raise arms up. Just food for thought. Quality is solid though!

Very soft and comfortable material! Sizing is off! I’m 5’2” and 128 pounds with a muscular build and ordered a small. It swallowed me. I normally wear small in tops. I would size down for sure even if you like a big sweatshirt…the sleeves were very long as well.
Comfortable.. Warm & Cosy!

All I can say is get one or five!!  These are the softest most comfortable sweatshirts I have ever owner.  The colors are sooo pretty.  They are dupes of the expensive ‘A’ brand.  Buy more than one - thank me later!
i love love love this sweatshirt i can’t seem to get myself out of it
I should of got a medium or even a small It's oversized Just a little too oversized for my liking. 133# 5'2
Soft, roomy, comfortable!  If lifting arms may show midriff if, you like that then this is the sweatshirt for you! I personally rather it keep mine covered lol but love this sweatshirt still!!!
Color was not as a deep red as picture shown. The length was shorter than expected.
Ordered an XS and it fits like a XL. Fabric is just ok, not overly soft or anything. I’m going to return it.
I purchased this and am pleasantly surprised at the level of comfort it has.  I can dress it up or remain casual.  Love the color.  Will plan to purchase in another color for Fall fashion.
Perfect baggy sweater for those colder days and the color is perfect. So warm and comfortable on the inside and super cute!
(for reference i'm 5'5 n got a small) super soft, comfy, n not too thick. it's a little boxy when you first get it but i washed it n now it's fine. overall 10/10 love thiss🥰🙌🏽
I do wish the neck line was a little bit more for giving, feels like its sits to high on the neck line. great material, thick and washes well.

Okay I had low expectations for this sweatshirt, but actually really love it!! The quality is so good. It’s so soft, looks really nice & warm on the inside. I’m usually between a S/M and am currently 27 weeks pregnant and a medium still fits pretty oversized. Super happy with this purchase and will probably end up buying more in a different color!
The color of this sweatshirt is as pictured. I wasn’t a fan of the way it fit. It says it’s a bigger fit however it made me look bulky / was unflattering
perfect oversized fit.
Runs true to size, very comfortable, lots of room - doesn't feel tight anywhere. Fabric is good quality.

Not as oversized as pictured - I bought a medium and fits like my regular clothes. Doesn’t come past my hips. But it is a comfy-ish sweater. Beware when you wash it for the first time, it sheds like crazy and will get the rest of your clothes covered.
Nice heavy sweatshirt the does not bind me.
The color is wayyy off! I have a coffee grey sports bra on the sweatshirt for comparison. Will be returning! The softness is great, but not the color I wanted & definitely not what was advertised!

I am very fond of sweatshirts and treasure my old comfortable sweats like a beloved friend.  You know that it takes time for a sweatshirt to become one of your favorites and I am sure that this particular sweatshirt will become my top choice after it gets broken in. I love the fabric, the quality and the fit.  I definitely recommend this manufacturer.

I like me a good oversized basic sweater and this is so comfy and the quality is amazing! It’s pretty light weight for cool summer nights but still has that cozy warmth. I’ll update this review after I give it a wash and see if it shrinks or not! 10/10👍 **UPDATE** Didn’t shrink a whole lot, I had it on the extra low heat setting in the dryer. Still looks super cute, looking forward to ordering in another color!
Sleeves really short

This sweater is my new favorite !!! It’s soo stylish, comfortable, soft & warm. It’s machine washable and dry able. The material isn’t cheap at all, it looks like a Nike cotton crew neck. I love it, definitely buy this if you’re thinking about it. I’m 5’3 & 135lbs and got a small & it fits perfectly 🫶🏻
Love the sweatshirt 💖
Great color and matches picture. However, it’s very boxy looking and sleeves are really short. Super awkward and unflattering fit. Also extremely thick
I bought this oversized sweatshirt to wear around the house after surgery. It's very soft and warm, and doesn't pill up after many washings. I will buy more colors.
Bought in every color. Super soft, fits true to size awesome quality
Color and fit is perfect! Didn’t shrink when washed and dried!
A little big but great quality and very warm.
This is so comfy and cute! I absolutely love it!
This was ridiculously oversized and wash it alone before you add it to your regular wash because fuzzys will get everywhere. After a wash it doesn't do it again though and it's very soft and warm

I bought one two sizes too big to have a comfy baggy sweater. Fit perfect when it came. Washed in cold water and low temp in dryer, however now the sleeves barely cover my elbows 😫. DO NOT RECOMMEND!!
Absolutely huge sizing i wish they had xs or xxs. and the lint gets everywhere !
I am shopping for more basic clothing to go with my loud colored clothes and staple pieces. This was a great addition to my closet. It’s warm & even cuter when it’s styled. 10/10
